main event: A UFO was observed over Dayton, Ohio, on May 5, 1959, appearing to be a bright light moving at high speed.
interesting points: The object was reported to be over 60,000 ft. high and moving very fast,The observer, a capt. in the USAF, estimated the speed at 360 m.p.h.,The object was bright orange and oval-shaped, and maneuvered before disappearing behind clouds,The observer claimed it was not an aircraft under their control,Multiple reports indicated that the investigation yielded no explanation for the sighting.
